resources.string: A module helps you to replace texts with any texts you want. Developed by liubaoyua.
A Xposed module developed by liubaoyua.
Note: You can config this module now, but your configurations will take effect only if Xposed framework installed and enabled!
Saved. It may take effect after relaunch the application. Kill the application now(root required)?

A module helps you to replace texts with any texts you want. Such as： 
 IDs、App names、Carrier label, 
 and other texts you see from you devices(I'm not sure it will work on all devices). 
 Any suggestion is welcomed. Send it to liubaoyua@gmail.com. 
 IF you know the regular expression, you could make better use of this module. 
-------------------------- 
 I've referred some open source projects. 
 The source code ofXposedGroot from github. 
 The source code ofHodor from github. 
 The source code ofApp settings from github. 
-------------------------- 
 And thank rovo89 for his Xposed and App settings, GermainZ for his Hodor and mitchtech for his XposedGroot.
